title: Celebrity traveller: Jerry Springer
text:
Celebrity traveller: Jerry Springer Celebrity traveller: Jerry Springer THE host of The Jerry Springer Show, 71, has also been mayor of Cincinnati and a political advisor to Robert F. Kennedy. PUBLISHED: 09:38, Sat, Oct 17, 2015 | UPDATED: 10:05, Sat, Oct 17, 2015 GETTY TV host Jerry Springer tells us about his travells 
He and wife Micki live in Sarasota, Florida, and have one daughter, Katie. 
MOST MEMORABLE HOLIDAY? 
A couple of years ago my sister Evelyn and I sailed from Southampton to New York on Cunard’s Queen Mary 2. We were born in London but in 1949 our family emigrated to the States on the original Queen Mary. The trip was a way of reliving that experience, although it was much shorter on that first journey. It took five days to reach America in 1949 but eight days on our trip. Related articles Springer to host dating show 
AND YOUR WORST? 
A work trip to Ethiopia in the early Eighties. I visited as part of a group called Cincinnati Reaches Out to deliver medicines. Once we left Addis Ababa we didn’t know if we’d reach our destination. There were six of us in two trucks and we took it in turns to sleep, navigate and drive. There were no mobile phones or satellite technology, it was all done on a compass reading. When we finally saw the village we were crying. We had thought we were going to die. GETTY Springer thought he might die in Eithopia 
WHICH GADGET IS ESSENTIAL? 
A little clip-on lamp that I can attach to my book as this enables me to read in even the darkest of spots. I love the smell and feel of a real book. GETTY The TV host loves reading books whilst on a trip A little clip-on lamp that I can attach to my book as this enables me to read in even the darkest of spots. Jerry Springer 
BEST HOLIDAY READ? 
I’m a history buff and I am working my way through Martin Gilbert’s A History Of The Twentieth Century at the moment. Doris Kearns Goodwin’s No Ordinary Time about Franklin and Eleanor Roosevelt was great, too. My family were wiped out during the Holocaust and from a very early age we talked about politics and social issues. Related articles Jerry blasts Opera 
HOW DO YOU SPEND YOUR TIME ON HOLIDAY? 
We are restful. As I get older we do far more sitting on beaches than we used to. We regularly rent a villa at the Hotel del Coronado which is on the island of Coronado off the coast of San Diego. Marilyn Monroe and Elizabeth Taylor stayed there. GETTY He and his family often rent a villa in San Diego 
WHERE WOULD YOU REVISIT? 
Fifteen years ago Micki and I went to Madrid before we travelled along the southern coast of Spain, through Cadiz and then on to Portugal. We’ve visited Tuscany more than a dozen times and are likely to go back. We’ve spent many a year in Capri, Florence and Positano. God was showing off when he created Italy. GETTY The next trip well may be to the Russian city of St Petersburg 
WHERE NEXT? 
We’re toying with the idea of Russia, in particular St Petersburg. I’ve never been to Russia but considering its history, which is rolling out in our lifetime, I feel we should go.
